snippet: Experts who have studied falls wish that people would take measures to protect themselves much as they do against heart disease or viral infections.
abstract: Experts who study falls and the injuries that result from them suggest preventative measures people, especially the elderly, can take to protect themselves from the potentially major health hazards of a fall.
lead_paragraph: Experts who have studied falls wish that people would take measures to protect themselves much as they do against heart disease or viral infections.
